parameter-group.name: start
parameter-group.label: Start command register configuration
parameter-group.description: Settings for discrete register used for sending start command.

parameter-group.name: stop
parameter-group.label: Stop command register configuration
parameter-group.description: Settings for discrete register used for sending stop command.

parameter.name: register
parameter.label: Register
parameter.description: Data register used to retrieve position of roller shutter.

options.option: WX: Input discrete data register (16 bit)
WY: Output relay data register (16 bit)
WM: Internal relay data register (16 bit)
WS: Step relay data register (16 bit)
WT: Timer discrete data register (16 bit)
WC: Counter discrete data register (16 bit)

parameter.name: index
parameter.label: Register index
parameter.description: Index of register used to retrieve data.

parameter.name: unsigned
parameter.label: Unsigned
parameter.description: Values retrieved from and written to device assume unsigned representation. Does not apply if floating option is set.

parameter.name: floating
parameter.label: floating point
parameter.description: Indicate that read/write value is a floating point number. Overrides unsigned flag.

parameter.name: startRegister
parameter.label: Register
parameter.description: Type of discrete register to write UP command.

parameter.name: startIndex
parameter.label: Register index
parameter.description: Index of register used to write data.

parameter.name: startInvert
parameter.label: Invert
parameter.description: Invert logical representation of related register (0->1, 1->0).

parameter.name: stopRegister
parameter.label: Register
parameter.description: Type of discrete register to write DOWN command.

parameter.name: stopIndex
parameter.label: Register index
parameter.description: Index of register used to retrieve data.

parameter.name: stopInvert
parameter.label: Invert
parameter.description: Invert logical representation of related register (0->1, 1->0).

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Time between next poll cycles, 0 assumes same value as Thing for which this channel is defined.
